About Products

Know more

AutomationWhiz

AutomationWhiz is a cloud-based RPA platform with cognitive capabilities. It not only helps users automate various business processes but also helps in identifying the processes that can be automated. It has 3 components; Bot Creator, Bot Executor and Bot Manager to create, execute and manage bots.

Know more

Intelligent Document Processing

Intelligent Document Processing (IDP) enables the automatic retrieval of information from any business document, such as invoices, receipts, PDF documents, images, emails, etc. Cygnet Infotech partnered with Glib.ai to bring in the best of IDP capabilities.

Know more

Cybot Store

Check out our custom industry/business function specific bots for automating processes with minimum time of deployment.
